source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View document_meta_data is created

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW document_meta_data_new
AS

/* Given we're building an SCD, we need to:
    1. Create a new record for completely new records that we've never seen before (including updates to existing records), 
    2. Unarchive records we've seen before and have become the latest info we want
    3. Archive records off that are not part of our net new

    First, we identify net new records
*/
SELECT
    NULL AS DocumentMetaDataID
    ,standardised.dataid AS DataID
    ,standardised.casenodeid AS CaseNodeID
    ,standardised.casereference AS CaseReference
    ,standardised.documentreference AS DocumentReference
    ,standardised.version AS Version
    ,standardised.name AS Name
    ,standardised.datasize AS DataSize
    ,standardised.viruscheckstatus AS VirusCheckStatus
    ,standardised.createdate AS CreateDate
    ,standardised.modifydate AS ModifyDate
    ,standardised.caseworktype AS CaseworkType
    ,standardised.publishedstatus AS PublishedStatus
    ,standardised.datepublished AS DatePublished
    ,standardised.documenttype AS DocumentType
    ,standardised.sourcesystem AS SourceSystem
    ,standardised.author AS Author
    ,standardised.representative AS Representative
    ,standardised.documentdescription AS DocumentDescription
    ,standardised.documentcasestage AS DocumentCaseStage
    ,standardised.filter1 AS Filter1
    ,standardised.filter2 AS Filter2
    ,standardised.parentID AS ParentID
    ,"0" AS Migrated
    ,"Horizon" AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,system_config.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID
    ,to_timestamp(standardised.expected_from) AS IngestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(standardised.dataid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.casenodeid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.casereference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentreference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.version,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.name,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.datasize	,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.createdate,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.modifydate,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.caseworktype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.publishedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.datepublished,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documenttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.sourcesystem,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.author,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.representative,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentdescription,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentcasestage,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.filter1,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.filter2,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.parentID,'.')
        )) AS RowID -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    ,'Y' AS IsActive
    ,NULL AS HistoricIsActive
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact AS system_config
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT
            dataID
            ,Version
            ,name
            ,MAX(expected_from) AS Last_update -- This is the PK on the table due to one dataID covering multiple files, and needing to return all versions
        FROM
            odw_standardised_db.document_meta_data
        GROUP BY
            dataID
            ,Version
            ,name
    ) AS Latest
        ON System_config.Description = "DocumentTree"
        AND system_config.IsActive = 'Y'
    INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.document_meta_data AS standardised
        ON Latest.dataID = standardised.dataId
        AND Latest.Version = standardised.Version
        AND Latest.name = standardised.name
        AND Latest.Last_update = standardised.expected_from
    LEFT OUTER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data AS Harmonised
        ON YEAR(standardised.CreateDate)  = Harmonised.Year
        AND standardised.DataID = Harmonised.DataID  
        AND standardised.Version = Harmonised.Version 
        AND standardised.name = Harmonised.name 
        AND md5(
                concat(
                        IFNULL(standardised.dataid,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.casenodeid,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.casereference,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.documentreference,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.version,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.name,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.datasize	,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.createdate,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.modifydate,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.caseworktype,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.publishedstatus,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.datepublished,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.documenttype,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.sourcesystem,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.author,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.representative,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.documentdescription,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.documentcasestage,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.filter1,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.filter2,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.parentID,'.')
                    )
                ) = Harmonised.RowID 
WHERE
    Harmonised.IsActive IS NULL
UNION
-- Next get records that we have seen, but are incorrectly set to archived
SELECT
    MIN(Harmonised.DocumentMetaDataID) AS DocumentMetaDataID
    ,standardised.dataid AS DataID
    ,standardised.casenodeid AS CaseNodeID
    ,standardised.casereference AS CaseReference
    ,standardised.documentreference AS DocumentReference
    ,standardised.version AS Version
    ,standardised.name AS Name
    ,standardised.datasize AS DataSize
    ,standardised.viruscheckstatus AS VirusCheckStatus
    ,standardised.createdate AS CreateDate
    ,standardised.modifydate AS ModifyDate
    ,standardised.caseworktype AS CaseworkType
    ,standardised.publishedstatus AS PublishedStatus
    ,standardised.datepublished AS DatePublished
    ,standardised.documenttype AS DocumentType
    ,standardised.sourcesystem AS SourceSystem
    ,standardised.author AS Author
    ,standardised.representative AS Representative
    ,standardised.documentdescription AS DocumentDescription
    ,standardised.documentcasestage AS DocumentCaseStage
    ,standardised.filter1 AS Filter1
    ,standardised.filter2 AS Filter2
    ,standardised.parentID AS ParentID
    ,"0" AS Migrated
    ,"Horizon" AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,system_config.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID
    ,to_timestamp(standardised.expected_from) AS IngestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(standardised.dataid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.casenodeid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.casereference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentreference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.version,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.name,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.datasize	,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.createdate,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.modifydate,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.caseworktype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.publishedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.datepublished,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documenttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.sourcesystem,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.author,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.representative,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentdescription,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentcasestage,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.filter1,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.filter2,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.parentID,'.')
        )) AS RowID -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    ,'Y' AS IsActive
    ,Harmonised.IsActive AS HistoricIsActive
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact AS system_config
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT
            dataID
            ,Version
            ,name
            ,MAX(expected_from) AS Last_update
        FROM
            odw_standardised_db.document_meta_data
        GROUP BY
            dataID
            ,Version
            ,name
    ) AS Latest
        ON System_config.Description = "DocumentTree"
        AND system_config.IsActive = 'Y'
    INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.document_meta_data AS standardised
        ON Latest.dataID = standardised.dataId
        AND Latest.Version = standardised.Version
        AND Latest.name = standardised.name
        AND Latest.Last_update = standardised.expected_from
    INNER JOIN  odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data AS Harmonised
        ON YEAR(standardised.CreateDate)  = Harmonised.Year
        AND standardised.DataID = Harmonised.DataID  
        AND standardised.Version = Harmonised.Version 
        AND standardised.Name = Harmonised.Name 
        AND Harmonised.IsActive = 'N'
        AND md5(
                    concat(
                            IFNULL(standardised.dataid,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.casenodeid,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.casereference,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.documentreference,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.version,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.name,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.datasize	,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.createdate,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.modifydate,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.caseworktype,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.publishedstatus,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.datepublished,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.documenttype,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.sourcesystem,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.author,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.representative,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.documentdescription,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.documentcasestage,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.filter1,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.filter2,'.'),
                            IFNULL(standardised.parentID,'.')
                        )
                ) = Harmonised.RowID 
GROUP BY
    standardised.dataid
    ,standardised.casenodeid
    ,standardised.casereference
    ,standardised.documentreference
    ,standardised.version
    ,standardised.name
    ,standardised.datasize
    ,standardised.viruscheckstatus
    ,standardised.createdate
    ,standardised.modifydate
    ,standardised.caseworktype 
    ,standardised.publishedstatus
    ,standardised.datepublished
    ,standardised.documenttype
    ,standardised.sourcesystem
    ,standardised.author 
    ,standardised.representative
    ,standardised.documentdescription
    ,standardised.documentcasestage
    ,standardised.filter1 
    ,standardised.filter2 
    ,standardised.parentID
    ,system_config.SourceSystemID 
    ,to_timestamp(standardised.expected_from) 
    ,md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(standardised.dataid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.casenodeid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.casereference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentreference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.version,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.name,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.datasize	,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.createdate,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.modifydate,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.caseworktype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.publishedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.datepublished,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documenttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.sourcesystem,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.author,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.representative,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentdescription,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.documentcasestage,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.filter1,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.filter2,'.'),
            IFNULL(standardised.parentID,'.')
        )
    ) 
    ,Harmonised.IsActive
UNION
-- Last if we've had an update to an existing file, add original data to ensure that it is archived as part of update
SELECT
    Harmonised.DocumentMetaDataID
    ,standardised.dataid AS DataID
    ,standardised.casenodeid AS CaseNodeID
    ,standardised.casereference AS CaseReference
    ,standardised.documentreference AS DocumentReference
    ,standardised.version AS Version
    ,standardised.name AS Name
    ,standardised.datasize AS DataSize
    ,standardised.viruscheckstatus AS VirusCheckStatus
    ,standardised.createdate AS CreateDate
    ,standardised.modifydate AS ModifyDate
    ,standardised.caseworktype AS CaseworkType
    ,standardised.publishedstatus AS PublishedStatus
    ,standardised.datepublished AS DatePublished
    ,standardised.documenttype AS DocumentType
    ,standardised.sourcesystem AS SourceSystem
    ,standardised.author AS Author
    ,standardised.representative AS Representative
    ,standardised.documentdescription AS DocumentDescription
    ,standardised.documentcasestage AS DocumentCaseStage
    ,standardised.filter1 AS Filter1
    ,standardised.filter2 AS Filter2
    ,standardised.parentID AS ParentID
    ,"0" AS Migrated
    ,"Horizon" AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,system_config.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID
    ,to_timestamp(standardised.expected_from) AS IngestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,Harmonised.RowID -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    ,'N' AS IsActive
    ,Harmonised.IsActive AS HistoricIsActive
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact AS system_config
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT
            dataID
            ,Version
            ,name
            ,MAX(expected_from) AS Last_update
        FROM
            odw_standardised_db.document_meta_data
        GROUP BY
            dataID
            ,Version
            ,name
    ) AS Latest
        ON System_config.Description = "DocumentTree"
        AND system_config.IsActive = 'Y'
    INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.document_meta_data AS standardised
        ON Latest.dataID = standardised.dataId
        AND Latest.Version = standardised.Version
        AND Latest.name = standardised.name
        AND Latest.Last_update = standardised.expected_from
    INNER JOIN  odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data AS Harmonised
        ON YEAR(standardised.CreateDate)  = Harmonised.Year
        AND Harmonised.IsActive = 'Y'
        AND standardised.DataID = Harmonised.DataID  
        AND standardised.Version = Harmonised.Version 
        AND standardised.Name = Harmonised.Name 
        AND md5(
                 concat(
                        IFNULL(standardised.dataid,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.casenodeid,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.casereference,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.documentreference,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.version,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.name,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.datasize	,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.createdate,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.modifydate,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.caseworktype,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.publishedstatus,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.datepublished,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.documenttype,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.sourcesystem,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.author,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.representative,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.documentdescription,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.documentcasestage,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.filter1,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.filter2,'.'),
                        IFNULL(standardised.parentID,'.')
                    )
                ) <> Harmonised.RowID

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View document_meta_data_changed_rows is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month -- Work out the closing date for files set the isActiveData to N
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    DataID  
    ,Version 
    ,Name 
    ,to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate
    ,IsActive
FROM 
    document_meta_data_new
WHERE
    IsActive = 'Y';

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW document_meta_data_changed_rows_final
AS
SELECT 
    DocumentMetaDataID
    ,raw.DataID
    ,CaseNodeID
    ,CaseReference
    ,DocumentReference
    ,raw.Version
    ,raw.Name
    ,DataSize
    ,VirusCheckStatus
    ,CreateDate
    ,ModifyDate
    ,CaseworkType
    ,PublishedStatus
    ,DatePublished
    ,DocumentType
    ,SourceSystem
    ,Author
    ,Representative
    ,DocumentDescription
    ,DocumentCaseStage
    ,Filter1
    ,Filter2
    ,ParentID
    ,Migrated
    ,ODTSourceSystem
    ,raw.SourceSystemID
    ,raw.IngestionDate
    ,raw.ValidTo
    ,raw.RowID
    ,raw.IsActive
    ,Date.ClosingDate
    ,YEAR(raw.CreateDate) AS year_created
FROM 
    document_meta_data_new  AS raw
    LEFT OUTER JOIN Loading_month AS DATE
        ON raw.DataID = Date.DataID
        AND raw.Version = Date.Version
        AND raw.Name = Date.Name
        AND raw.IsActive = 'N'

# View document_meta_data_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data AS Target
USING document_meta_data_changed_rows_final AS Source   
    ON Target.Year = Source.year_created
    AND Target.DocumentMetaDataID = Source.DocumentMetaDataID 
-- Updates existing rows. If they're records we've seen before unarchive, otherwise archive
WHEN MATCHED THEN 
    UPDATE 
    SET
        Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate)
        ,Target.IsActive = Source.IsActive
-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        DocumentMetaDataID
        ,DataID
        ,CaseNodeID
        ,CaseReference
        ,DocumentReference
        ,Version
        ,Name
        ,DataSize
        ,VirusCheckStatus
        ,CreateDate
        ,ModifyDate
        ,CaseworkType
        ,PublishedStatus
        ,DatePublished
        ,DocumentType
        ,SourceSystem
        ,Author
        ,Representative
        ,DocumentDescription
        ,DocumentCaseStage
        ,Filter1
        ,Filter2
        ,ParentID
        ,Migrated
        ,ODTSourceSystem
        ,SourceSystemID
        ,IngestionDate
        ,ValidTo
        ,RowID
        ,IsActive
        ,Year)
    VALUES (
        Source.DocumentMetaDataID
        ,Source.DataID
        ,Source.CaseNodeID
        ,Source.CaseReference
        ,Source.DocumentReference
        ,Source.Version
        ,Source.Name
        ,Source.DataSize
        ,Source.VirusCheckStatus
        ,Source.CreateDate
        ,Source.ModifyDate
        ,Source.CaseworkType
        ,Source.PublishedStatus
        ,Source.DatePublished
        ,Source.DocumentType
        ,Source.SourceSystem
        ,Source.Author
        ,Source.Representative
        ,Source.DocumentDescription
        ,Source.DocumentCaseStage
        ,Source.Filter1
        ,Source.Filter2
        ,Source.ParentID
        ,Source.Migrated
        ,Source.ODTSourceSystem
        ,Source.SourceSystemID
        ,Source.IngestionDate
        ,Source.ValidTo
        ,Source.RowID
        ,Source.IsActive
        ,Source.year_created)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new document_meta_data

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DocumentMetaDataID NULLS LAST) AS DocumentMetaDataID
    ,DataID
    ,CaseNodeID
    ,CaseReference
    ,DocumentReference
    ,Version
    ,Name
    ,DataSize
    ,VirusCheckStatus
    ,CreateDate
    ,ModifyDate
    ,CaseworkType
    ,PublishedStatus
    ,DatePublished
    ,DocumentType
    ,SourceSystem
    ,Author
    ,Representative
    ,DocumentDescription
    ,DocumentCaseStage
    ,Filter1
    ,Filter2
    ,ParentID
    ,Migrated
    ,ODTSourceSystem
    ,SourceSystemID
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,RowID
    ,IsActive
    ,Year
FROM odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data;
